pr_title: [BEAM-6661] Get rid of a few logging annoyances for execution and shutdown

timeline.message:
[BEAM-6661] Properly close channel for external environment

This avoids warnings like the following:

```

Make sure to call shutdown()/shutdownNow() and wait until awaitTermination() returns true.
```

[BEAM-6661] Avoid FileNotFoundException when no files have been staged

[BEAM-6661] Avoid printing empty lines in subprocess job server

This would print an extra empty line on every logged line making the output
verbose, e.g.

Before:
```
logline1

logline2

```

After:
```
logline1
logline2
```

timeline.bodyText: Nit: awaitTermination already returns whether the channel is terminated, so no need to call isTerminated
timeline.author: ibzib

timeline.bodyText: Why 10 seconds? Does shutdown usually take that long?
timeline.author: ibzib

replies.bodyText: No, it usually takes ~1 second. 10 seconds is just the max waiting time which we have in a bunch of places.
replies.author: mxm
